title: Nice 'n Spicy
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fusion restaurant that allows the creation of several types of mix-match pasta and rice bowls with different sauces and proteins. Several fixed menu items are also listed that are primarily Thai, of which some are vegan or can be made vegan. Tofu is a part of some dishes or is a choice if you create your own bowl. Very small restaurant with around 5 or 6 tables. Reservations are accepted. Located on Roatan Island.
